participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and nostalgic, loves connecting with others through shared experiences.
participant_1.background: I love to look through my souvenirs from my travels and reminisce about my adventures. I love playing with my cats after a long day of gigging. I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. I bought a bouquet of daisies for my wife on our anniversary. I am afraid of not being able to control my diabetes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoys simple pleasures and staying active.
participant_2.background: I'd like to go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way. I am 5'3" and love movie time. I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake. My favorite food to harvest is carrots. I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.

content.text: I love to play music and I love to travel.  What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to swim in the lake.  It's so relaxing and it helps me clear my head.
That's awesome!  I love to swim in the ocean, but I've never been swimming in a lake.  Do you prefer to swim in the ocean or in a lake?
I prefer to swim in a lake.  I'm not a very strong swimmer and the waves in the ocean can be scary for me.
I'm sorry to hear that.  I hope that you get a chance to try swimming in a lake sometime soon.  It's really fun!
Thanks!  I'll keep that in mind.  What's your favorite place that you've traveled to?
My favorite place that I've traveled to is Paris.  I love the history and the culture of Paris.
That's awesome!  I've always wanted to go to Paris.  What's your favorite thing about Paris?
My favorite thing about Paris is the food.  I love the French food!
I've heard that the French food is amazing!  I'll have to try some French food sometime soon.
You're welcome!  It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too
